content: I heard there's a <style=Highlight>dinner party</style> tonight, right mah~? I-I've never been to one before! So I asked <style=NpcName>Mobai</style> if I could help out...
info: 聚餐之前-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: When in doubt, ask The Skies Above! {A观察顶处}O' great skies and seas, I ask thee... <style=SizeSmall>Is my cookin' gonna make someone sick?</style>
info: 聚餐之前-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A害羞冒烟}And Mobai asked me to prepare a dish too. We've just met, and now everyone's gonna taste my cookin'? But my cookin' skills... Oh no, now I'm nervous!
info: 聚餐之前-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: She had this awful look on her face when she tried it... {A害羞冒烟}Now I'm worried you're gonna think my cookin' tastes weird.
info: 聚餐之前-云果闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Well mah, my sense of taste is kinda different from everyone else's. Even when I follow Gran'mama's recipe exactly...
info: 聚餐之前-云果闲聊_主流程文本II
